data.name: confirmation
data.value:
Confirmation

As soon as the order has been placed, the customer will receive a confirmation email that includes an electronic invoice. So, it is important that you provide us with a valid email address during the buying process. We advise you to register your email address with whom you placed an order to facilitate contact our customer service in case of a request. Email your confirmation also serves as proof of purchase. (document proof)

data.name: order
data.value:
Order

Taking the order on the website is subject to compliance with the procedure established by the MOFT on the site comprising successive stages leading to order validation. The customer can select as many products as he wants which will be added to the cart. The basket summarizes the products chosen by the customer, as well as their prices and costs. The customer can freely change the basket before confirming your order. Validation the order deserves confirmation of the customer's acceptance of TGC, a of the purchased products, their price and costs associated. Placing an order on behalf of another person without consenting to it or placing an order that might the cause of economic damage MOFT will be the subject of a report police. MOFT reserves the right to change prices at any time time or to correct incorrect prices. If a price has been declared incorrectly, MOFT will be obliged to cancel the order and repay the contributions as much as he can. This can be done happen at any time. A confirmation email summarizing order (product(s), price, availability of the product(s), quantity etc.) will be sent to the customer. For this purpose, the customer formally accepts the use of email for confirmation by to MOFT of the contents of its order.

data.name: payment
data.value:
Payment

Payment is made online at the customer's choice: via Paypal or via credit card. All credit card payments are made through the secure platform of our payment provider Stripe. MOFT no does not process any credit card data. Payment by credit card Accepted cards are: Visa, Mastercard. All purchases made on the site are protected and secured 7 days a week and 24 hours a day.

data.name: product
data.value:
Product

The products offered for sale are those that appear on the site on the day its consultation by the client. The products are described and presented as accurately as possible. MOFT can't be made responsible in case of minimal variations between products and their presentation on the website. MOFT undertakes to deliver products which meet the requirements in force relating to security and people's health in accordance with European provisions, and in especially with the legislation on chemicals with content regulated.

data.name: selling conditions
data.value:
Condiții de vânzare

Introduction

The General Terms and Conditions of Sale ("CG") detailed below apply to all product orders made through the website www.moft-bijoux.com of the BORGO company, 1 Avenue Simon Vouet, 78560 Le Port Marly by the customer. Customer must read the T&Cs prior to any order, the T&Cs being available on the website. In the consequently, the fact of placing an order on our website reflects full, prior and unreserved acceptance of the GTC by client.
